array.string: <b:t>To make 1 pink goo,</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">3 red goo</b:ot> <b:t>is needed for every</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">1 white goo.</b:ot> <b:t>What is the ratio of red goo to white goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot>
<b:t>What is the ratio of white goo to red goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot>
<b:t>There are</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">4 white goo.</b:ot> <b:t>How many pink goo can be made??</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">4</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">1</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="6">4</b:ot>
<b:t>For a recipe,</b:t> <b:ot tag="d">5 pink goo</b:ot> <b:t>is needed. How many red goo will be needed?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">5</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="15">15</b:ot>
